data.name: Connect_Description
data.value: Open a new connection to an Exchange server using the auto discovery service

data.name: Connect_Summary
data.value: <if(CONNECTION)>Open Exchange connection using the exchange server's auto discovery service and store it into <CONNECTION><else> Open Exchange connection using the exchange server's auto discovery service<endif>

data.name: ConnectToExchangeServer_Connection_Description
data.value: The specific Exchange connection for use with later Exchange actions

data.name: ConnectToExchangeServer_ConnectionType_Description
data.value: Specifies how to connect to the Exchange server

data.name: ConnectToExchangeServer_CredentialsMode_Description
data.value: Specifies the way to provide the user's Exchange credentials

data.name: ConnectToExchangeServer_Description
data.value: Open a new connection to an Exchange server

data.name: ConnectToExchangeServer_Domain_Description
data.value: The Exchange account domain. To extract the account domain from the username, leave this field empty

data.name: ConnectToExchangeServer_ServerVersion_Description
data.value: The version of the Exchange server

data.name: ConnectToExchangeServer_Timeout_Description
data.value: The time in seconds to wait for the connection to be established before the action fails

data.name: ConnectToServer_Description
data.value: Open a new connection to an Exchange server by its address

data.name: ConnectToServer_Summary
data.value: <if(CONNECTION)>Open Exchange connection with server address <SERVERADDRESS> and store it into <CONNECTION><else> Open Exchange connection with server address <SERVERADDRESS><endif>

data.name: ConnectToServerWithCredentials_Description
data.value: Open a new connection to an Exchange server by its address

data.name: ConnectToServerWithCredentials_Summary
data.value: <if(CONNECTION)>Open Exchange connection with server address <SERVERADDRESS> and store it into <CONNECTION><else> Open Exchange connection with server address <SERVERADDRESS><endif>

data.name: ConnectWithCredentials_Description
data.value: Open a new connection to an Exchange server using the auto discovery service

data.name: ConnectWithCredentials_Summary
data.value: <if(CONNECTION)>Open Exchange connection using the exchange server's auto discovery service and store it into <CONNECTION><else> Open Exchange connection using the exchange server's auto discovery service<endif>

data.name: Error_AttachmentNotFoundError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the specified attachment(s) don't exist

data.name: Error_ConnectToExchangeServerError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem connecting to the Exchange server

data.name: Error_ConnectToExchangeServerError_FriendlyName
data.value: Failed to connect to the Exchange server

data.name: Error_InvalidMailFolderError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the specified mail folder doesn't exist

data.name: Error_MailFolderNotFoundError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the specified mail folder doesn't exist

data.name: Error_ProcessEmailMessagesError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem processing the specified email messages

data.name: Error_RetrieveEmailMessagesError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem retrieving the email messages

data.name: Error_SaveAttachmentsError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem saving the attachments

data.name: Error_SendEmailMessageError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem sending the email

data.name: Exchange_Description
data.value: Automate sending, receiving, and managing emails through Exchange

data.name: MarkEmailsAsUnread_Description
data.value: Mark selected email messages as unread

data.name: MoveEmails_Description
data.value: Moves email messages to a predefined Exchange folder

data.name: MoveEmails_Summary
data.value: Move email messages <EMAILSTOPROCESS> to personal mail folder <EXCHANGEFOLDER>

data.name: MoveEmailsToAccount_Description
data.value: Move email messages to a predefined Exchange folder of a shared mailbox

data.name: MoveEmailsToAccount_Summary
data.value: Move email messages <EMAILSTOPROCESS> to shared mail folder <EXCHANGEFOLDER>

data.name: MoveEmailsToAccountFolder_Description
data.value: Move email messages to a custom mail folder of a shared mailbox

data.name: MoveEmailsToAccountFolder_Summary
data.value: Move email messages <EMAILSTOPROCESS> to shared mail folder <MAILFOLDER>

data.name: MoveEmailsToFolder_Description
data.value: Move email messages to a custom mail folder

data.name: MoveEmailsToFolder_Summary
data.value: Move email messages <EMAILSTOPROCESS> to personal mail folder <MAILFOLDER>

data.name: ProcessEmailOperation_Move_FriendlyName
data.value: Move email messages to mail folder

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_Connection_Description
data.value: The Exchange connection. Create an Exchange connection with the 'Connect to Exchange server' action

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_Description
data.value: Move, delete or mark as unread an email message (or a list of email messages)

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_EmailsToProcess_Description
data.value: The email message(s) to process. Use a variable populated by a 'Retrieve Exchange email messages' action

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_ExchangeFolder_Description
data.value: A predefined Exchange folder to move email messages from

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_MailboxType_Description
data.value: The type of the mailbox to retrieve email messages from

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_MailFolder_Description
data.value: The name or path (e.g. folder1\folder2) of the mail-folder to move email messages to

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_MoveToCustomFolder_Description
data.value: Specifies whether to move email messages to a custom folder or a predefined Exchange folder

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_Operation_Description
data.value: Specifies which operation to perform on the specified email messages

data.name: ProcessExchangeMessages_SharedMailboxAddress_Description
data.value: The address of the shared mailbox to retrieve email messages from

data.name: RetrieveEmails_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from the specified Exchange server

data.name: RetrieveEmails_Summary
data.value: Retrieve emails from personal mail folder <EXCHANGEFOLDER>

data.name: RetrieveEmailsAndSaveAttachments_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from the specified Exchange server and saves the attachments

data.name: RetrieveEmailsAndSaveAttachments_Summary
data.value: Retrieve emails from personal mail folder <EXCHANGEFOLDER>

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromAccount_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from a specified account of an Exchange server

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromAccount_Summary
data.value: Retrieve emails from shared mail folder <EXCHANGEFOLDER>

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromAccountAndFolder_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from a specified account and folder of an Exchange server

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromAccountAndFolder_Summary
data.value: Retrieve emails from shared mail folder <MAILFOLDER>

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromAccountAndFolderAndSaveAttachments_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from a specified account and folder of an Exchange server and saves the attachments

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromAccountAndFolderAndSaveAttachments_Summary
data.value: Retrieve emails from shared mail folder <MAILFOLDER>

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromAccountAndSaveAttachments_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from a specified account of an Exchange server and saves the attachments

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromAccountAndSaveAttachments_Summary
data.value: Retrieve emails from shared mail folder <EXCHANGEFOLDER>

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromFolder_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from a specified folder of an Exchange server

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromFolder_Summary
data.value: Retrieve emails from personal mail folder <MAILFOLDER>

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromFolderAndSaveAttachments_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from the specified Exchange server and save the attachments

data.name: RetrieveEmailsFromFolderAndSaveAttachments_Summary
data.value: Retrieve emails from personal mail folder <MAILFOLDER>

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_AttachmentsOptions_Description
data.value: Specifies whether to save the attachments of the email messages retrieved or not

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_BodyContains_Description
data.value: The key phrase to find within the email body. Leave this attribute blank to retrieve all email messages regardless of their content

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_Connection_Description
data.value: The Exchange connection. Create an Exchange connection with the 'Connect to Exchange server' action

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_Description
data.value: Retrieve email messages from the specified Exchange server

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_EmailMessages_Description
data.value: The retrieved email messages for later processing as a list of Exchange mail messages objects

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_ExchangeFolder_Description
data.value: A predefined Exchange folder to retrieve email messages from

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_FromContains_Description
data.value: The full email address of the sender to retrieve messages from. Leave this attribute blank to retrieve all messages regardless of the sender

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_FromCustomFolder_Description
data.value: Specifies whether to retrieve email messages from a custom folder or a predefined Exchange folder

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_FromCustomFolder_FriendlyName
data.value: Retrieve email messages from custom folder

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_MailboxType_Description
data.value: The type of the mailbox to retrieve email messages from

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_MailFolder_Description
data.value: The name or path (e.g. folder1\folder2) of the mail-folder to retrieve email messages from

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_MarkAsRead_Description
data.value: Specifies whether to mark as read the retrieved email messages or leave them as is

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_RetrieveMode_Description
data.value: Specifies whether to retrieve all email messages in the folder or only the unread ones

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_SaveAttachmentsInto_Description
data.value: The folder to save the attachments into

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_SharedMailboxAddress_Description
data.value: The address of the shared mailbox to retrieve email messages from

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_SubjectContains_Description
data.value: The key phrase to find within the email subject. Leave this attribute blank to retrieve all email messages regardless of their subject

data.name: RetrieveExchangeMessages_ToContains_Description
data.value: The full email address(es) of the recipient(s) (separated by space if more than one) for the email messages to retrieve. Leave this attribute blank to retrieve all email messages regardless of the recipient(s)

data.name: SendMessage_Attachments_Description
data.value: The full path of any attachment(s). Enclose multiple files in double quotes (") and separate them by a space character

data.name: SendMessage_BCC_Description
data.value: The email(s) of the BCC (hidden) recipient(s). To enter more than one email, separate the list of addresses by semi-colons

data.name: SendMessage_CC_Description
data.value: The email(s) of the CC recipient(s). To enter more than one email, separate the list of addresses by semi-colons

data.name: SendMessage_Connection_Description
data.value: The Exchange connection. Create an Exchange connection with the 'Connect to Exchange server' action

data.name: SendMessage_Description
data.value: Create and send a new email message

data.name: SendMessage_IsBodyHtml_Description
data.value: Specifies whether to interpret the body of the email as HTML coding

data.name: SendMessage_SendTo_Description
data.value: The email(s) of the recipient(s). To enter more than one email, separate the list of addresses by semi-colons

data.name: SendMessage_Summary
data.value: Send email message to <SENDTO> with subject <SUBJECT>

data.name: ErrorMessage_ConnectionFailed
data.value: Failed to connect to the Exchange server.

data.name: ErrorMessage_ExchangeServiceIsUnInitialized
data.value: Exchange service is un-initialized. Please doublecheck that the correct Exchange service has been specified and that it is used after a 'Connect to Exchange server' action

data.name: ErrorMessage_FailedToRetrieveEmails
data.value: Failed to retrieve email messages from the Exchange server

data.name: ErrorMessage_FailedToSaveAttachments
data.value: Failed to save attachment(s) for message with uid '{0}'

data.name: ErrorMessage_FailedToSaveAttachmentsInDirectory
data.value: Failed to save attachment(s) in directory '{0}' for message with uid '{1}'

data.name: ErrorMessage_FolderPathNotFound
data.value: Failed to find mail folder '{0}' on the Exchange server

data.name: ErrorMessage_InvalidTimeoutTime
data.value: Timeout must be greater than zero (0)

data.name: ErrorMessage_MailFolderNotFound
data.value: Mail folder {0} doesn't exist on the Exchange server.

data.name: ErrorMessage_MailProcessFailed
data.value: Failed to process email messages on Exchange server

data.name: ExchangeMailMessageAsString
data.value: Exchange Mail message from {0} with subject {1}
